wikipedia_page.main: Bill Jones (1924-1995) was a footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for Manchester City and Chester.He subsequently played non-league football, playing for Witton Albion before joining Mossley in the 1955–56 season where he made 15 appearances scoring two goals.
